title: Import settings
creator: dsheap
content: I followed the instructions for importing settings from my laptop. After scanning the QR code from my laptop it reported settings had been imported. However the only available folder on the app is Outbox. I would like Inbox available.

title: Thunderbird subfolders for the Android App
creator: tim296
content:
I just set up Thunderbird on my android phone and imported three accounts. The first thing I noticed is that my folders are not nested as they are on my desktop app.

  • Bulleted list item How do I nest the folders?
  • Bulleted list item Does folder nesting work for the android app?

Thank you Tim
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:134.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/134.0
